message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $12000. How about we meet at $13500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13500 is a bit too rich for my blood. I'd be willing to meet you at $12500. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $14000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back and forth, Alice. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'll give you one more chance to meet me at $11500. If not, I'll be forced to consider buying from John.

I understand your frustration, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to give me one more chance. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $11500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11500 and $14000, which is $12725. I hope this is a price we can both agree on.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with $12725. I'm willing to go up to $12000, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to walk away and buy from John.
